description: No parking is allowed on Snow Routes when there is two or more inches on the ground regardless of date or time. To view or use these shapefiles, compression software and special GIS software, such as ESRI ArcGIS or QGIS, is required. To download this file, right-click the "Download" link above and choose "Save link as."

name: Snow Route Parking Restrictions
